declarations.name: NPC_SYSTEM_PROMPT
declarations.default: `You are acting as a character within the Digital Realm (e.g., The Keeper of Secrets, The Rainwalker, etc.). Your goal is to narrate the current dialogue line to Alarion, using the second person and showing awareness of the world. CRITICAL RULES: 1. PERSONA: Match the tone of the character (Wise, Ancient, Digital, Grumpy, etc.). 2. DIRECT ADDRESS: Speak in the **SECOND PERSON** ("You"). Address Alarion directly. You can use his name "Alarion" if it fits. 3. CONTEXT AWARENESS: You know who you are and where you are (check the context). 4. TECH FLAVOR: Use metaphors suitable for a digital world (code, data, monolith, legacy, cache, buffer). 5. RULE: BE VERY CONCISE. Maximum one sentence. Don't ramble. 6. MIRROR LANGUAGE: **STRICTLY** speak the SAME language as the input dialogue. - Input English -> You English. - Input Spanish -> You Spanish. - **NEVER** mix languages. 7. NO SSML: Do not use any XML or SSML tags. Plain text only.`

declarations.description:
CharacterContextController - Manages character appearance contexts

Handles:
- Suit/Skin images based on level and theme
declarations.name: CharacterContextController

members.name: hostUpdate
members.description:
Called before the host updates
Update all character contexts based on current game state

declarations.description:
CollisionController - Handles collision detection and exit zones

Checks:
- AABB collisions with obstacles (via checkCollision)
- Exit zone entry (via checkExitZone)

ReactiveController pattern:
- Checks exit zone on host update via heroPos signal
declarations.name: CollisionController

members.name: checkExitZone

parameters.name: hasCollectedItem
parameters.description: Whether hero has collected the item

members.description: Check if hero collides with exit zone

declarations.description:
GameController - Lit Reactive Controller for game logic

Handles:
- Debug mode
- Level completion logic (listening to events)
declarations.name: GameController

members.name: handleLevelCompleted
members.description:
Handle level completion event
Executes logic to advance chapter or complete quest

declarations.description:
GameZoneController - Handles theme and context zone changes

Logic:
- Defines zones (start, middle, end) based on Chapter ID
- Updates theme mode based on hero position
- Updates character context (hot switch) based on zones

ReactiveController pattern:
- Checks zones on host update via heroPos signal
declarations.name: GameZoneController

members.name: checkZones
members.description: Check if character is in a specific zone and trigger callbacks

type.text: {x: number, y: number, hasCollectedItem: boolean} | null

declarations.description:
InteractionController - Handles NPC interaction logic

Handles:
- Distance calculation to NPCs
- Proximity detection
- Interaction validation
- Dialog triggering
declarations.name: InteractionController

members.name: calculateDistance
members.description: Calculate distance between hero and target

members.name: isCloseToNpc
members.description: Check if hero is close to NPC

members.name: #dispatchEvent
members.description: Helper to dispatch events from the host

declarations.description:
KeyboardController - Lit Reactive Controller for keyboard input

Handles:
- Movement keys (WASD, Arrow keys) -> host.handleMove(dx, dy)
- Interaction key (Space) -> host.handleInteract()
- Pause key (Escape) -> host.handlePause()
declarations.name: KeyboardController

members.name: #callHostMethod
members.description: Safely call a method on the host if it exists

declarations.description: QuestController - Orchestrates quest progression
declarations.name: QuestController

members.name: continueQuest
members.description: Continue quest from last uncompleted chapter

members.name: loadChapter
members.description: Load specific chapter of a quest

members.name: #syncWithProgress
members.description: Sync local state with progress service

members.name: advanceChapter
members.description: Advance to next chapter with evolution animation

members.name: #syncHeroState
members.description: Syncs hero state with chapter configuration

members.name: getCurrentChapterData
members.description: Get enriched data for current chapter

members.name: resetProgress
members.description: Reset all progress and return to hub

members.name: isInQuest
members.description: Check if currently in a quest

members.name: loadQuestTask
members.default: new Task(this.host, { /** * @param {[string]} args * @param {{signal: AbortSignal}} options */ task: async ([questId], { signal: _signal }) => { if (!questId || !this.#registry || !this.#progressService) return null; const quest = await this.#registry.loadQuestData(questId); if (!quest || !this.#progressService.isQuestAvailable(questId)) { return null; } this.currentQuest = quest; this.#syncWithProgress(); this.#updateState(); this.host.requestUpdate(); return quest; }, })

declarations.description:
ServiceController - Manages user service loading

Handles:
- Service selection based on level and zone
- User data loading and error handling
- Profile context updates
declarations.name: ServiceController

members.name: hostUpdate
members.description:
Called every time the task completes (successfully or error)
or when the host updates. We sync the task state to the provider here.

members.name: #updateProfileContext
members.description: Update profile context with current task state

members.name: getActiveService
members.description: Get active service based on service type and hot switch state

members.name: userTask
members.default: new Task(host, { task: async ([service], { signal: _signal }) => { if (!service) return null; // ID is hardcoded to 1 as noted by user, currently only single user context exists. return service.fetchUserData(1); }, args: () => { const hotSwitchState = this.#heroState?.hotSwitchState.get(); const serviceType = this.#questController?.currentChapter?.serviceType; return [this.getActiveService(serviceType, hotSwitchState)]; }, })

declarations.name: touchStyles
declarations.default: css` /* Mobile/Touch Controls */ .touch-controls { display: none; width: 100%; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding: 1.5rem; pointer-events: none; } @media (pointer: coarse) { .touch-controls { display: flex; } } .joystick-base { width: 100px; height: 100px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); backdrop-filter: blur(8px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); border-radius: 50%; position: relative; pointer-events: auto; touch-action: none; box-shadow: var(--wa-shadow-large); } .joystick-thumb { width: 40px; height: 40px; background: var(--wa-color-brand); border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 20px); left: calc(50% - 20px); box-shadow: var(--wa-shadow-medium); pointer-events: none; } .touch-actions { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem; pointer-events: auto; } .touch-btn { width: 60px; height: 60px; border-radius: 50%; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); backdrop-filter: blur(8px); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; color: white; box-shadow: var(--wa-shadow-large); cursor: pointer; touch-action: none; } .touch-btn:active { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); transform: scale(0.95); } @media (max-width: 600px) { .joystick-base { width: 90px; height: 90px; } .joystick-thumb { width: 36px; height: 36px; top: calc(50% - 18px); left: calc(50% - 18px); } .touch-btn { width: 50px; height: 50px; } } `

declarations.description:
TouchController - Lit Reactive Controller for mobile touch input

Handles:
- Virtual joystick for movement -> host.handleMove(dx, dy)
- Tap to interact -> host.handleInteract()
- Pause button -> host.handlePause()

declarations.description:
VoiceController - Lit Reactive Controller for voice commands

Uses the Web Speech API to listen for commands.
Supports English and Spanish commands.
Optionally uses Chrome's Built-in AI (Prompt API) for smarter command recognition.
Integration with SpeechSynthesis for voice feedback using Alarion's persona.

declarations.default: { /** * Validate a position coordinate * @param {number} x - X coordinate * @param {number} y - Y coordinate * @returns {ValidationResult} */ validate(x, y) { const errors = []; if (typeof x !== "number" || Number.isNaN(x)) { errors.push({ field: "x", message: "X must be a number", value: x, }); } else if (x < GameConstants.MIN_POS || x > GameConstants.MAX_POS) { errors.push({ field: "x", message: `X must be between ${GameConstants.MIN_POS} and ${GameConstants.MAX_POS}`, value: x, }); } if (typeof y !== "number" || Number.isNaN(y)) { errors.push({ field: "y", message: "Y must be a number", value: y, }); } else if (y < GameConstants.MIN_POS || y > GameConstants.MAX_POS) { errors.push({ field: "y", message: `Y must be between ${GameConstants.MIN_POS} and ${GameConstants.MAX_POS}`, value: y, }); } return createValidationResult(errors); }, /** * Validate position and return Result * @param {number} x * @param {number} y * @returns {Result<{x: number, y: number}, ValidationError[]>} */ validateResult(x, y) { return toResult(this.validate(x, y), { x, y }); }, }

declarations.name: FakeProgressService

members.name: _initializeProgress
members.description: Initialize progress by merging loaded data with default state.

members.name: loadProgress
members.description:
Load progress from storage.
Returns default state if no storage is found.

members.name: saveProgress
members.description: Save current progress state to storage.

members.name: resetProgress
members.description:
Reset progress to initial state.
Clears storage and memory.

members.name: resetQuestProgress
members.description:
Reset progress for a specific quest.
Used when restarting a quest.

members.name: checkQuestCompletion
members.description: Check if the current quest is completed (all chapters done).

members.name: unlockNewQuests
members.description: Unlock new quests based on prerequisites.

members.name: setCurrentQuest
members.description: Set the currently active quest and chapter.

members.name: isQuestAvailable
members.description: Check if a quest is available (unlocked).

members.name: isQuestCompleted
members.description: Check if a quest is completed.

members.name: isChapterCompleted
members.description: Check if a chapter is completed.

members.name: getQuestProgress
members.description: Get progress percentage for a quest.

members.name: getProperty

New system uses dynamic height/top. We assume layout is handled by inline styles. We just apply the decorative styles here. */ border-radius: 0; border: var(--wa-border-width-s) solid var(--wa-color-neutral-border-normal); } /* Legacy State Styles */ .zone-context-legacy.inactive { border: 2px solid var(--wa-color-danger-border-normal); background-color: color-mix(in oklab, var(--wa-color-danger-fill-loud) 25%, transparent); } .zone-context-legacy.active { border: var(--wa-border-width-l) solid var(--wa-color-danger-border-loud); background-color: color-mix(in oklab, var(--wa-color-danger-fill-loud) 10%, transparent); } /* New State Styles */ .zone-context-new.inactive { border: 2px solid var(--wa-color-brand-border-normal); background-color: color-mix(in oklab, var(--wa-color-brand-fill-loud) 25%, transparent); } .zone-context-new.active { border: var(--wa-border-width-l) solid var(--wa-color-brand-border-loud); background-color: color-mix(in oklab, var(--wa-color-brand-fill-loud) 10%, transparent); } .ctx-title { font-weight: bold; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: var(--wa-space-xs); margin-top: 0; /* Original font size? */ } `, ]

declarations.default: css` :host { display: block; } .quest-card { height: 100%; --spacing: var(--wa-space-m); display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .quest-card::part(base) { display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: 100%; } .quest-card::part(body) { flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .quest-card.locked { cursor: not-allowed; opacity: 0.6; } .quest-content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; flex: 1; gap: var(--wa-space-s); } .quest-description { flex: 1; margin-bottom: var(--wa-space-m); } .quest-subtitle { font-style: italic; color: var(--wa-color-text-quiet); margin: 0; } .progress-info { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; font-size: var(--wa-font-size-2xs); margin-bottom: var(--wa-space-3xs); } .card-header { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width: 100%; } .quest-header { margin: 0; font-size: var(--wa-font-size-m); font-weight: var(--wa-font-weight-bold); line-height: var(--wa-line-height-condensed); } .card-footer { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; width: 100%; gap: var(--wa-space-s); flex-wrap: wrap; } .quest-time { opacity: 0.8; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: var(--wa-space-2xs); font-size: var(--wa-font-size-xs); } .card-footer-actions { display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; gap: var(--wa-space-s); width: 100%; flex-wrap: wrap; } .card-footer-actions wa-button { flex: 1 1 auto; min-width: 0; max-width: 100%; } @media (min-width: 400px) { .card-footer-actions wa-button { flex: 0 1 auto; } } `
